name: Being a ball
description:
Being a ball is tough sometimes, the hurdles to cross are numerous but the trip is rewarding ! 

More than 20 levels

This challenging 3D plateform game will get you through more than 20 levels. Between calming levels and some a bit more crazy, you will help this poor ball get all gold gems and find his way in this colorful world.  Rolling in this world seems nice at first sight but be careful of the dangers ! It includes some mini-games and bonus levels to relax yourself in this adventure !

Author note

I'm glad you came visiting and hope you have fun playing Being a ball. I'm Thomas, a 29 years old software engineer and beginner as game developper. Being a ball is the first game I made, my goal was to finish a it in one month. I learned a lot during the process and discovered an amazing game development community on both itchio and Twitter :)
